about_the_game:
Drive into the evolving demo for Careening, a 1-2 hour chunk of the game that will have you Driving into Drones, Running over Robots, and Assisting with Automaton Destruction in this vehicle-based, exploration focused, slightly-frictiony Bullet Heaven.

Careening is an in-progress title, and feedback from the demo will help guide it towards a better future, the one I hope we can find for us all.

short_description: Careening is an exploration focused Bullet Heaven. Explore its world, destroy robots, and unlock permanent upgrades as you try to survive, racing against a clock that just never seems to give you enough time.
